response.original_title: The Haunting Legacies of Pit-Ponies: Exploitation and the Echoes of Human-Equine Relations in Mining Systems
response.overview: This experimental film examines the entangled histories of human and equine lives bound in colonial and patriarchal oppressions through the industrial landscapes of Cornish pasts. Informed by the concept of 'haunting,' this practice research considers how legacies of exploitation continue to shape contemporary human-equine relationships.
response.title: The Haunting Legacies of Pit-Ponies: Exploitation and the Echoes of Human-Equine Relations in Mining Systems
